# LMA10, Ar, 87.3 K
# Standard data for the adsorption of Ar at 87.3 K on reference carbon LMA10.
# A. Silvestre-Albero et al., Carbon 66 (2014) 699. 
# (i.e., n/nm -where nm is the monolayer capacity from which the BET surface area is determined- against P/P0)
# nm = 7.37e-5 [mol/g], V(alpha-s=1) = V(P/P0=0.4) = V0.4 = 2.68 [cm3(STP)/g]
# S(BET) = 6 [m2/g], C = 101, nm = 7e-5 [mol/g] by pyGASP code
# S [m2/g]= slope [cm3(STP)/g] * 6.00/2.68 = slope [cm3(STP)/g] * 2.238806
# P/P0, alpha-s, n/nm
